document.full_text: u.s. soldiers in afghanistan are heading into what may be a pivotal fighting season that determines the scale of an initial u.s. troop withdrawal starting this summer, a senior u.s. official said.
document.title: coming weeks will test u.s. troop surge in afghanistan
lines_and_colors: u.s. soldiers in afghanistan are heading into what may be a pivotal fighting season that determines the scale of an initial u.s. troop withdrawal starting this summer, a senior u.s. official said.
